paragraphs: More than 16 years of experience in the design and development of products and applications using web technologies. Currently serving as Engineering Manager at Google.

Strong knowledge of the software development life cycle, including requirements analysis, detailed specifications, development, testing, and deployment with Agile and waterfall methodologies. Seasoned people manager, mentor and coach to both individual contributors and managers. Drives engineering excellence and craftsmanship throughout the front-end development process.

details: Web development team lead for the Monetization product group, including lead developer for the Jobs product suite. Built the Jobs homepage, apply flow, and Saved Jobs and Recommended Jobs features.

Member of the Yahoo! HotJobs and Yahoo! Buzz front-end development teams. Code auditing through existing and legacy code for front-end security issues, including Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) and Cross-Site Request Forgery (XSRF) attacks
Member of the TeamSite product client team, responsible for the web-based user interface in Java/JSP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Principally designed and solely implemented web-based application user interfaces for several products/projects, including the Dynamic Content Adapter 2.0 and several other prototype/demo projects. Implemented in Java, JSP, HTML, CSS, and also heavily drawing upon JavaScript. Built upon Cisco Systems proprietary application server-like back-end web technology and AJAX-like front-end technology.

skills: CSS, including CSS3, Sass, Compass, Responsive CSS
JavaScript and various frameworks - React, Redux, Backbone, Marionette, Ember, jQuery, Underscore/Lodash, YUI
JavaScript Unit Tests - Mocha, Chai, Enzyme, testdouble
Package management and build tools - npm, Broccoli
Server side frameworks - Node.js, Ruby on Rails, Java/JSP, PHP, Play
